column5: Do you need a boat to fish it?  Are there any maps of the lake? Where are some spots to take the kids that they will catch some fish? any tips?  Thanks speed
I will be there in August but I can't help you until then
Yup, me too!!!!  There are a couple of people on the forum that have extensive knowledge of the lakes in the park.  I'm sure they will chime in and give you some help with a PM.

Been there, fished it. Best with a boat - but did not get to try Storm lake which it looked like most of the serious fishers hit. Next time Did catch a 47" pike  - needed a boat to get there Kids - try the boat launch at the W end of the camp grounds. Big and small mouths, perch and Rock bass Tips. If it looks like it has pike in it probably does. But get out early
Hello , I have been fishing Restoule for over 20 years now and camping in the Provincial Park.PM me and I can tell you all you need to know about Restoule.
Hi Bowslayer  would really appreciate the help.   thanks Rob
Can't help ya Rob... but glad to see you planning a fishing trip !!

There's lots of smallmouth bass in the river just below the falls by the town of Restoule.  Toss small spinners with worms into the pads along either side if you have a boat.  There's also a gov't dock there if you're fishing from shore.  Not much size, but the action should keep the kids happy.
i have a map of the lake i can email you.  Send me a message and I will send it to you  Cheers!
I will PM you later today with some details on the lakes and park
